resources.string: Contacts with phone number are in different color

This app can backup/restore contacts, share contacts via vCard and Bluetooth, as well as export and import them via CSV or vCard files. It allows you to Backup contacts either on the cloud or on you device and can restore them anytime in any device.
It also shows how many times you called a contact, when you last called (even if it was several years ago) and has advanced filtering options. It also comes with a toolkit to delete duplicates as well as the capability to restore deleted contacts.
